name: Smokefree
body:
### Welcome to the Smokefree Lawrence Project

This project is to implement a reasonable smoking ban in Lawrence Kansas. 

Sign our petition here :
http://changekansas.org/action/petition/stop-smoking-on-mass-street-lawrence

See the newspaper article here :
http://www2.ljworld.com/news/2014/jul/26/petition-calls-smoking-ban-massachusetts-street/?c=2429177

Like us on Facebook :
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Smoke-Free-Lawrence/1517095688504558
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
